docs.lead_paragraph: A drug already shown to reverse the effects of obesity in mice and make them live longer has now been shown to increase their endurance as well.

headline.main: Red Wine Ingredient Increases Endurance, Study Shows
headline.print_headline: Red Wine Ingredient Increases Endurance, Study Shows

docs.snippet: A drug already shown to reverse the effects of obesity in mice and make them live longer has now been shown to increase their endurance as well.

docs.lead_paragraph: The drug resveratrol doubles the physical endurance of mice running on treadmills, a leading journal reported.
docs.snippet: The drug resveratrol doubles the physical endurance of mice running on treadmills, a leading journal reported.

docs.lead_paragraph: A new study suggests that high doses of a best-selling drug used to treat anemia in dialysis and cancer patients may increase the risk of heart problems.

headline.main: Heart Risk Seen in Drug for Anemia
headline.print_headline: Heart Risk Seen in Drug For Anemia

docs.snippet: A new study suggests that high doses of a best-selling drug used to treat anemia in dialysis and cancer patients may increase the risk of heart problems.

docs.lead_paragraph: Doctors should stop trying to open arteries in people who had heart attacks days or weeks before and who are stable and free of chest pain, researchers say.

headline.main: Study Questions Angioplasty Use in Some Patients
headline.sub: Implanting Stents Days After Heart Attack May Not Be a Benefit   ;
headline.print_headline: study questions angioplasty use in some patients

docs.snippet: Doctors should stop trying to open arteries in people who had heart attacks days or weeks before and who are stable and free of chest pain, researchers say.
